name: Tequila Tour Puerto Vallarta
description: We invite you to discover the significance of tequila through our journey that will take you north of Puerto Vallarta into the surrounding mountains and volcanoes. As we make our way to Tequila Town you will have the option to stop for breakfast (price not included in tour). Then we will go onto the “Valle de Cactla” near the majestic colonial city of Compostela. After that we then make our way to “Volcan Ceboruco”, which happens to be one of the 9 active volcanos of México. We will also show you “Ixtlan de el Rio” where the sensational round shapes are there to honor the wind God “Ehecatl”.
